game.title: Quest for Harmony - The Prince's Journey
game.synopsis: A young prince sets out to defeat an evil sorcerer and restore balance to his kingdom, honing his magical skills and proving his bravery in the face of adversity.
game.beginning: He embarks on a perilous journey, encountering dragons and treacherous bandits.
game.ending: After a climactic battle, the prince defeats the sorcerer and brings peace back to the land, vindicating the prophecy.
